meanings.sent1: She displayed her collection of chatchkas on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The shop sold various chatchkas like keychains and figurines.
meanings.sent3: The chatchkas on the table sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with chatchkas, turning it into a mini museum.
meanings.sent5: The chatchkas added a touch of charm to the room.

meanings.sent1: He kept a box of random chatchkas in his drawer.
meanings.sent2: The garage sale had a section dedicated to old chatchkas.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly referred to his messy desk as a chatchkas paradise.
meanings.sent4: The clutter of chatchkas made it hard to find anything important.
meanings.sent5: The pile of chatchkas seemed to grow bigger every day.

meanings.definition: Items of little value or importance.
meanings.sent1: The box of broken chatchkas was ready to be thrown away.
meanings.sent2: She sorted through the pile of chatchkas, looking for something valuable.
meanings.sent3: The chatchkas in the bargain bin were priced at rock-bottom.
meanings.sent4: The room was cluttered with chatchkas that held sentimental value.
meanings.sent5: The collection of chatchkas held memories of past adventures.
